text:
Batchpatch is always worth a look. 
I was looking at what manageengine had to offer and I spotted a competitor I’ve
not heard of before: NinjaOne. 
Anyone have any experience with that one? 
https://www.gartner.com/reviews/market/service-orchestration-and-automation-platforms/vendor/ninjaone/product/ninjaone/reviews?marketSeoName=service-orchestration-and-automation-platforms&vendorSeoName=ninjaone&productSeoName=ninjaone
 
Cynthia Erno

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
Batchpatch is always worth a look. 
I was looking at what manageengine had to offer and I spotted a competitor I’ve
not heard of before: NinjaOne. 
Anyone have any experience with that one? 
https://www.gartner.com/reviews/market/service-orchestration-and-automation-platforms/vendor/ninjaone/product/ninjaone/reviews?marketSeoName=service-orchestration-and-automation-platforms&vendorSeoName=ninjaone&productSeoName=ninjaone
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gartner.com%2Freviews%2Fmarket%2Fservice-orchestration-and-automation-platforms%2Fvendor%2Fninjaone%2Fproduct%2Fninjaone%2Freviews%3FmarketSeoName%3Dservice-orchestration-and-automation-platforms%26vendorSeoName%3Dninjaone%26productSeoName%3Dninjaone&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C5326e1e184a1474718a308dc28a59251%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638429938813520372%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=3is4FIvR3CY3HHxXJf7rCw9TPOEfPkR5SpwnxcxsHLk%3D&reserved=0] 
Cynthia Erno 
From: 'McLennan, Jason' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 8, 2024 5:36 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what? 
ATTENTION: This email came from an external source. Do not open attachments or
click on links from unknown senders or unexpected emails. 
We’re looking into this now. Tanium wasn’t even on our list to evaluate so I’ll
add it 😊 
Didn’t really get on with Ivanti, the console just looked old and tired, and
they seem to have just bolted on some basic Linux stuff just so they could say
‘you can manage Linux as well’. 
We’ve had a few demos with ManageEngine Endpoint Central and that looks pretty
good, nice web GUI and some neat features. We’re trialling how it works across
multiple segregated domains at the moment and will probably go with that if it
works due to cost vs functionality. 
We only need it for servers, not clients. 
Classification: BUSINESS
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/SA0PR09MB711665C114236453DBB68187A5442%40SA0PR09MB7116.namprd09.prod.outlook.com
